tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_barcode VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    barcode VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE warehouses (
    warehouse_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    warehouse_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE barcode_scanners (
    scanner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scanner_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id),
    warehouse_id INT REFERENCES warehouses(warehouse_id),
    action_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT REFERENCES inventory_transactions(transaction_id),
    log_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
